programme.desc: The crime family Jamie infiltrated orders the assassination of Jimmy Riordan, his undercover alias - so Frank puts him under house arrest for protection. Meanwhile, Danny and Jackie investigate the suspicious death of a big-spending investor who sustained serious injuries in a fight.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Teenager Logan starts work as an apprentice deck-hand, while landlady Pat recalls fond memories from her life in Brixham.(n)

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens Stillman's 1983 case of a Chinese-American teenager who was murdered three months after his girlfriend was killed by gang members. Crime drama, starring Kathryn Morris and Danny Pino.(n)

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1999 case of a high-school debate champion whose death was originally ruled as suicide, and suspicion surrounds the victim's then new team-mates, with jealousy the suspected motive.(n)

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: The Vice President is asked to speak at an anti-gun rally in Texas, while Donna appears before a Congressional committee investigating President Bartlet's failure to disclose his medical condition - and lies under oath.(n)

programme.title: House
programme.desc: An obese 10-year-old is brought in after suffering a heart attack, apparently caused by diet pills. When bleeding sores appear on the youngster's chest, the doctors look to each other for someone to blame. Meanwhile, House is ordered to sack one of the team.(n)

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a teenager who is believed to have gone missing so he can execute an elaborate plan to bomb his school. They learn that bullies had picked a fight with him the day before his disappearance, and discover he had a chilling obsession with safety.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: The Reagans prepare to mark Mother's Day, an occasion that holds particular significance for them - but Frank struggles to focus on his family's needs as he tries to prevent a biological weapons attack on New York City. Meanwhile, a long-standing conflict between Danny and Jamie finally boils over.(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: The head of the Russian mob hits LA to find out what happened to Belikov. Meanwhile, Sonia takes refuge at the Donovan house. Starring Liev Schreiber and Jon Voight.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Russell sets up a confrontation between Dr Brown and a formidable opponent, while Gamby seeks to impress his daughter. Comedy, starring Danny McBride and Walton Goggins.(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer receives bad news from the doctor, Reggie looks to cheer Vernon up with an unusual pet, and Ricky bumps into an old flame.(n)

programme.title: The Crash Reel
programme.desc: Lucy Walker's documentary charts American snowboarder Kevin Pearce's rehabilitation after suffering a traumatic brain injury during training for the 2010 Winter Olympics. The film examines the potentially high price of participation in extreme sports and sheds light on the trend of athletes pushing the boundaries in their pursuit of glory.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Kristian `Yatesy' Yates dresses up as an unusual Santa Claus to get into the Christmas spirit, while Trent `Maxi' Maxwell is exempted from his lifeguard duties to cook the turkey. Meanwhile, the team helps a teenager who has fallen off his mountain bike and injured his arm.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: The lifeguards welcome 19-year-old Jake Nolan to the team, but his fledgling friendship with Trent `Maxi' Maxwell is compromised by news that only one of them will become full-time members of staff at the end of the season. Both get the chance to help plenty of people on the beach, especially when there is another bluebottle jellyfish plague.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: The lifeguards face challenging conditions as large waves sweep into the area around Bondi Beach. Despite several warnings, swimmers keep taking their chances in the dangerous conditions, leaving the team exhausted from countless rescues. Many people fall foul of the sea, picking up injuries from small cuts to fractures.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Revellers cause trouble when they arrive in the area to celebrate New Year's Eve, and in the morning the lifeguards wonder whether to close parts of the beach for safety reasons. Anthony `Harries' Carroll demonstrates his tow-truck skills as he tries to unblock the car park.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Bruce `Hoppo' Hopkins welcomes an inexperienced apprentice lifeguard to the Bondi Beach team. Luckily she arrives on a calm day and few rescues are carried out, but tourists ignoring jellyfish warnings lead to a queue of sting victims needing treatment.(n)

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Trent `Maxi' Maxwell enjoys his apprenticeship on Temira's beach, which is 500 miles north of Sydney, but has to patrol the nudist areas naked. On Bondi, the lifeguards deal with an influx of revellers on Australia Day, and intervene in a barbecue brawl.(n)

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Omnibus edition catching up with all the latest events in Albert Square.(n)

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl finds an abandoned nest of goose eggs and raises the chicks when they hatch. As winter approaches, the birds need to fly south, so she and her inventor father construct a light aircraft to lead the way. Family adventure, starring Jeff Daniels, Anna Paquin, Dana Delany and Terry Kinney.(n)

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: A talented student doctor turns the medical community upside down with his offbeat views about the healing power of laughter. His methods provoke outrage and intense debate among his professors - but his extrovert nature brightens the lives of all kinds of patients. Comedy drama, starring Robin Williams, Monica Potter, Daniel London, Bob Gunton and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: A chambermaid at an exclusive hotel daringly tries on a designer dress belonging to a guest - and is spotted by a wealthy politician, who mistakes her for a socialite and invites her on a date. However, the differences in their social backgrounds soon become apparent and threaten their budding romance. Comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson and Bob Hoskins.(n)

programme.title: Outnumbered
programme.desc: Ben takes his talent for lying to a new level, while Pete finds himself being questioned about his SAS training and friendship with then prime minister Gordon Brown. Meanwhile, Sue arranges a romantic night at home, but her plans could be scuppered if Karen's friend and her mother are still hanging around.(n)

programme.title: Outnumbered
programme.desc: Pete worries he might be out of a job when he finds his troubles splashed across the front page of the local paper. Ben claims he is too ill to go to school, but manages a telling question-and-answer session. The family also has to cheer up Auntie Angela when she is dumped by her boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Outnumbered
programme.desc: Karen has had enough of her mother's nagging and packs her bags, as preparations get under way for the family dinner party. Ben is put in charge of cracking the eggs - a responsibility his dad later regrets giving him - and the boy develops a taste for gin when the guests arrive. Angela announces she is moving back to Australia.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.sub-title: Beast of Times, Worst of Times.
programme.desc: Vincent and Cat discover that there is another nemesis out to get him, which brings the gang closer together in more ways than one. However, the pair find themselves forced on opposite sides of the law, which puts their relationship in jeopardy. Fantasy drama, starring Kristin Kreuk and Jay Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock
programme.desc: A terrified client claims his father was killed by a monstrous creature stalking the wilds of Dartmoor, so Holmes and Watson head to the countryside to investigate. But what seemed like mere fantasy back in Baker Street proves a very different prospect when the duo look into an ultra-secret army base at the edge of the moor. Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman star in this adaptation of Conan Doyle's most famous Sherlock Holmes story, The Hound of the Baskervilles, with Russell Tovey (The Job Lot), Amelia Bullmore (Scott & Bailey) and Clive Mantle (Casualty).(n)

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are? USA
programme.desc: The West Wing and Parks and Recreation actor Rob Lowe traces his family history, learning that one of his ancestors fought against George Washington during the American Revolution.(n)

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Bedfordshire police pursue a car thief driving recklessly around the streets of Luton, who then tries to evade capture by running away and climbing through the window of a building. programme.title: Being Human USA
programme.sub-title: It's My Party and I'll Die If I Want To.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are? USA
programme.desc: US actor and comedian Jason Sudeikis travels across America to learn the story of his father's ancestors.(n)

The pair plan to stake a claim in the Oklahoma gold rush, but instead Joseph is forced to become a bare-knuckle fighter to support them. programme.desc: Ben tries to get elected as the class rep, while Pete returns from a colleague's funeral troubled by mortality, money problems and the anaconda attack his son is filming in the garden. Domestic comedy, starring Hugh Dennis and Claire Skinner.(n)

programme.desc: Sue and Pete ban TV and computers for one whole Sunday, freeing up quality time for family pastimes such as hide-and-seek and card games. programme.desc: New series. programme.desc: Louise grows suspicious of Ben's behaviour, Bex seeks advice from Stacey, and Steven is frustrated when Lauren buys a laptop to help her pitch for new business, despite the financial difficulties at Beale's continuing to grow.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del is invited to a school reunion at the Nag's Head organised by old adversary Roy Slater (Jim Broadbent), who has recently been released from prison and claims to have turned over a new leaf. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: An audition gives Raquel the chance of a lifetime - and perhaps more importantly, an excuse to get out of Nelson Mandela House. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: He Ain't Heavy, He's My Uncle.

Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del becomes a showbiz entrepreneur after discovering a sensational Tom Jones-style singer at a local club. Teaming him up with Raquel, he wastes no time in booking the duo at a birthday party for the elderly mother of a local hoodlum - but it soon becomes clear his new signing is not everything he is cracked up to be. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones, with a guest appearance by Philip Pope.(n)

programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part One: The American Dream.

programme.sub-title: Three Men, a Woman and a Baby.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses

The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Brad Pitt, George Clooney, John Malkovich, Frances McDormand and Tilda Swinton.(n)

programme.desc: Vince falls for aqua-aerobics instructor Stacey, and finds himself volunteering to take part in a charity swimathon - despite being unable to swim. Meanwhile, Errol allows a single mum to practice her `salsasice' in their living room.(n)

programme.title: Extras
programme.desc: Hoping to gain himself greater acting credibility, Andy takes a role in A Month of Summers, a two-hander directed by Ian McKellen. However, he is shocked to discover the specifics of the production's plot. Germaine Greer, Mark Kermode and Mark Lawson guest as themselves.(n)

programme.desc: Jeremy tries to impress Toni with his new job in a music studio, while Mark is disappointed at being passed over for promotion. Starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Flip Men
programme.desc: Mike and Doug discover a supposedly quick job is going to take much longer - when they realise the house they have bought was owned by a hoarder.(n)

programme.title: Flip Men
programme.desc: Mike and Doug are conned out of thousands of dollars, so they retaliate by carrying out a late-night sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May take a look at increasingly popular tall hatchbacks known as crossovers. Having concluded their primary appeal is to caravanners, the duo spend a couple of days in models by Mazda and Volkswagen and try to get a feel for what life is like for the people they believe would buy one. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond drives a pair of exciting Lamborghinis in Italy - the ferocious Aventador Roadster and the limited-edition Sesto Elemento, which carries an eye-watering price tag of around £2million. Two cars are also put through their paces on the test track, with James in a modern re-creation of the classic Porsche 911 and Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler in the rather less exotic Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond celebrates the Porsche 911 by taking the GT3 to its limits, James May tries out the BMW 5 series and Jeremy Clarkson tests Ford's supercar the GT40. Plus, a tribute to the endurance of the Toyota pickup, and a chance to see how the show's 20-year-old Jaguar finally met its end. Martin Kemp is the Star in a Resonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson puts the Lamborghini Gallardo through its paces, Richard Hammond tests enduring classic the Miura, and James May gets behind the wheel of 1980s favourite the Countach. Plus, a series of tuned Mini Coopers are taken for a spin, and the team stages a unique car long jump competition. American comedian Rich Hall is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage of the offbeat event which comes from the Cauberg, a hill in the southern town of Valkenburg, Holland.(n)

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Police officers in Bedfordshire find a stash of drugs in a car when they pull over a motorist who is taking his children to school. Plus, a drink-driver is apprehended when she pulls onto a petrol station forecourt. Narrated by Jamie Theakston.(n)

programme.title: Motorway Cops
programme.desc: How traffic police officers often rely on experience and an awareness of suspicious behaviour or circumstances to catch out motorists with something to hide, despite the wealth of technology and data available to them.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond travel to Africa, where they are challenged to buy a second-hand car costing less than £1,500 and in no way designed to go off-road, and drive across Botswana. Along the way they must negotiate salt pans, rivers and reserves full of animals while facing sweltering heat and suffocating dust.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May head to Norway to find out how a selection of cars fare when taking part in Winter Olympic events. Their experiments include firing a rocket-powered Mini off a ski jump, tackling the biathlon with 4x4s, staging a game of motorised ice hockey and timing the Jaguar XK in a speed-skating race.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May set out to boost the British economy by embarking on a trade mission to India. Equipped with three old British cars and a range of uniquely British products, they set off on an epic road trip across one of the world's most fascinating and challenging countries, devotedly promoting Britain - with distinctly mixed results.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: A spotlight on all things automotive begins with a look at muscle cars, featuring a visit with aficionado Tim Allen and a ride with NASCAR legend Jimmie Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The motoring show returns with new hosts Chris Evans and Matt LeBlanc, featuring test drives, spectacular stunts and reports on the latest models. Joining the new presenters are commentator Eddie Jordan, world record-breaking German racing driver Sabine Schmitz, renowned motoring journalist Chris Harris, car reviewer and TV presenter Rory Reid, and of course, the Stig. Things get under way as Chris takes the Dodge Viper ACR to the home of Top Gun in Nevada to battle it out against Sabine, who is behind the wheel of a Chevrolet Corvette Z06. Matt LeBlanc tackles the wilds of Morocco in the Ariel Nomad, before returning to British soil to take on Evans in a gruelling UK v USA challenge. Plus, this weeks guests are The Social Network star Jesse Eisenberg, and volatile TV chef Gordon Ramsay.(n)

programme.desc: The steep streets of Cincinnati's Mount Adams neighbourhood play host to the crazy cart designs, 40,000 people going wild and plenty of crashes.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage from Barcelona of an event where teams create vehicles without engines and race downhill.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage of the international event from London's Alexandra Palace in which amateur drivers race home-made, engineers vehicles. Over the years, vehicles have ranged from a piano to a giant baby carriage, and the latest contenders include C-17 Roadmaster, Braking Badly, Poldark Express and Turbo Tugboat.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage of the offbeat event, where teams create vehicles without engines and race downhill. This round comes from St Patrick's Hill in Cork as competitors hope their vehicles have what it takes to clinch victory.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May set out to boost the British economy by embarking on a trade mission to India. Equipped with three old British cars and a range of uniquely British products, they set off on an epic road trip across one of the world's most fascinating and challenging countries, devotedly promoting Britain - with distinctly mixed results.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May travel to America for an interstate road trip, completing various challenges along the way. Starting in Miami, they each buy a car for less than $1,000 and drive to New Orleans, where they set out to give their vehicles away to people who suffered in Hurricane Katrina.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a road trip, trying to follow the path of the Three Wise Men across the Middle East. However, they opt to do so in open-top sports cars that were built for significantly less demanding tasks than driving along the conflict-ridden mountains of southern Turkey, through war-ravaged Iraq and across the searing deserts of Syria. The trio also try to find out what myrrh is and where it can be bought.(n)

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: An uncompromising major is placed in charge of a seemingly suicidal mission to destroy a French chateau being used as a base by Nazi officers. Needing tough but expendable soldiers for the task, he recruits 12 hardened criminals from a military prison. Second World War action adventure, starring Lee Marvin, Telly Savalas, Ernest Borgnine, Charles Bronson and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond, Jeremy Clarkson and James May try to find the perfect car for 17-year-olds, dealing with insurance companies, accident repairs and a muddy music festival car park in the process. Richard also visits Abu Dhabi to test the Lamborghini Murcielago SV and stages a race between the 1000hp Bugatti Veyron and the McLaren F1. Actor, writer and comedian Stephen Fry is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Stephen Fry presents an extended edition of the quiz that tests the most obscure parts of contestants' general knowledge, awarding points for interesting answers as well as correct ones. Regular panellist Alan Davies is joined by Bill Bailey, Jimmy Carr and Only Connect host Victoria Coren Mitchell to answer fiendish questions on the topic of jargon.(n)

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Comedians Milton Jones, Russell Howard and Jack Whitehall and comedienne Holly Walsh join Dara O Briain on the quiz show to offer their opinions on world events in an edition from 2009.(n)

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Dara O Briain hosts a 2009 edition of the comedy quiz, as guests Kevin Bridges, Ed Byrne and Chris Addison join panellists Hugh Dennis, Russell Howard and Andy Parsons to offer opinions on world events.(n)

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: In an edition first shown in February 2010, Dara O Briain presents highlights from the quiz, as panellists Hugh Dennis, Russell Howard and Andy Parsons offer their take on world events.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy bargains galore.(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie is stunned when Mike wears a Hawaiian shirt to dinner with friends, Sue puts her foot in it with Devin, and Brick becomes overly ambitious while cleaning the bathroom.(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie is stunned when Mike wants to invest in one of his brother's bizarre business ideas, while Axl desperately tries to prove that he is capable of riding his dad's motorcycle. Sue plucks up the courage to confess something to Brad.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe learns the truth about her father, while a malfunctioning radiator in Monica's apartment goes into overdrive, making her Christmas celebrations steamier than anticipated. Comedy, starring Lisa Kudrow and Courteney Cox.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel meets a man called Russ who bears an uncanny resemblance to Ross, further confusing her already muddled emotions. Meanwhile, Joey discovers he will have to pass an intimate audition on the casting couch to get a part in a daytime soap.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding.
programme.desc: Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with help from an uncomfortable Ross, while Rachel is shocked by an announcement from her mother - she is getting divorced and plans to go on a voyage of sexual self-discovery. Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer star.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Joey lands a date with a fan, but soon learns she is unhinged. Ross tries to track down Marcel at San Diego Zoo, and Phoebe is hired for a new singing job. Brooke Shields, Chris Isaak and Dan Castellaneta guest star.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Rachel tries to fix up Monica with action-movie star Jean-Claude Van Damme, but ends up landing a date with him herself. Meanwhile, Chandler gets his comeuppance for a high-school prank he played on a former classmate. Guest starring Julia Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Prom Video.
programme.desc: Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a sign of their friendship, while Rachel insists she has no time for Ross - until Monica's old prom video helps her see him in a different light. Comedy, starring Jennifer Animation, Courteney Cox and David Schwimmer.(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Sue loses Brick while he is visiting her, Frankie brings in reinforcements to find out why Mike is down and Axl gets bad news after asking the city for help with his ant problem.(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: In a Halloween special, each member of the Heck family finds themselves in situations reminiscent of classic, spooky TV show The Twilight Zone.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel - You Know.
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel finally consummate their relationship, and it seems romance is also on the horizon for Monica - but the object of her affections happens to be old enough to be her father. With guest star Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out.
programme.desc: Monica's parents are dismayed to discover she is dating their middle-aged friend, and an argument with Chandler prompts Joey to move out of the flat. Matthew Perry and Matt LeBlanc star, with guest appearances by Tom Selleck and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The pranksters disrupt a focus group by reading out ridiculous answers and then participate in a thrilling toilet paper shootout in their favourite market.(n)

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Candy.
programme.desc: Rachel gets a dressing-down at work for dating Tag, while Monica tries to buy her neighbours' friendship by making sweets for them - but finds their appetites to be greater than her desire to be popular.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where They're Up All Night.
programme.desc: Ross and Joey get trapped on the roof while waiting to watch a meteor shower. Monica's exhaustion leads to trouble with Chandler, and Rachel argues with Tag over which of them failed to post a parcel.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel tries to make amends with work rival Gavin, but realises she will never get along with him. Ross urges Joey to stay away from Emma's new nanny, while Phoebe and Mike adopt a litter of rats. Melissa George and Dermot Mulroney guest star.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone except Ross pools their money to buy lottery tickets, but a disagreement about how to spend any winnings prompts a disdainful Phoebe to make a rash gesture. Chandler frets as he waits for a phone call that could mean a new job, and Rachel thinks Emma is close to saying her first word.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel joins Joey on the set of his soap opera, where a steamy love scene inspires unexpected feelings - and a saucy dream. Phoebe takes an opportunity to serenade a captive audience, while Chandler plans to whisk Monica away - but ends up inviting Ross. Jennifer Aniston and Matt LeBlanc star.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe's big day arrives, but wedding planner Monica and stand-in father of the bride Joey take their roles a little too seriously. To make matters worse, a blizzard hits New York and one of Mike's ushers is indisposed, forcing Ross and Chandler to step into the breach.(n)

programme.title: Spiceworld: The Movie
programme.desc: Musical comedy, following the Spice Girls and their highly strung manager as they board their tour bus and get up to all sorts of strange adventures while preparing for a major concert at the Royal Albert Hall. programme.title: American Pie Presents: Beta House
programme.desc: Erik Stifler looks forward to joining his cousin Dwight at college for a life of round-the-clock partying, but the spoilsport members of a more studious fraternity are determined to stop him having fun. Comedy, starring John White and Steve Talley, with Eugene Levy reprising his role from the original film.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys watch a TV documentary exploring the history of Thanksgiving, and become convinced that aliens and ghosts were involved in the tale. However, the search for the truth about the first feast threatens to change the celebration for ever.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny's parents are arrested, leaving the put-upon youngster and his siblings at the mercy of the care system. Meanwhile, Cartman is bereft when his orange-hooded friend is taken away from school - mainly because he no longer has a poor classmate to make the butt of his jokes.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys learn the importance of proper bathroom etiquette after Clyde ignores advice and leaves the toilet seat up after use - with devastating consequences.(n)

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Bob finds himself at the centre of a hostage crisis when a thief holds up the bank across the street from his restaurant and the robbery goes awry. Featuring the voices of H Jon Benjamin, Kristen Schaal and Eugene Mirman, with a guest performance by Bill Hader.(n)

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Bob hires an arcade game for the restaurant, and becomes obsessed with getting a higher score than his rival Jimmy Pesto. Featuring the guest voice of Aziz Ansari (30 Minutes or Less).(n)

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go.
programme.desc: Chandler begins to have grave doubts about new flatmate Eddie - just as Joey starts house-hunting. programme.sub-title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies.
programme.desc: Monica's boyfriend makes a good impression on Chandler and Joey. Phoebe gets a shock while watching a film and Rachel begins to resent Ross planning their future. US comedy, starring Courteney Cox, David Schwimmer and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler and Ross face two bullies at Central Perk. Monica decides to have a flutter on the stock market and Phoebe meets a long-lost family member. Comedy, guest starring Giovanni Ribisi (Avatar).(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The pals plan a surprise party for Rachel, but her recently separated mother and father show up. To keep the parents apart, the gang decides to have two different gatherings. Comedy, guest starring Marlo Thomas (That Girl) and Ron Leibman.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe catches chickenpox just as her seafaring boyfriend returns home. Joey gets a job at Chandler's company and Monica becomes obsessed with proving Richard is more neurotic than she is. American comedy, guest starring Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Barry and Mindy's Wedding.
programme.desc: Chandler becomes enamoured with a woman he meets on the internet, and the subject of children proves a thorny one for Monica and Richard. Rachel relives the ordeal of her failed wedding day while serving as bridesmaid at her former fiance's ceremony. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston.(n)

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham.(n)

programme.title: Michael McIntyre's Showtime
programme.desc: The popular stand-up entertains 20,000 fans in a show recorded during his 10-night run at the London O2 in 2012. The show features anecdotes about watching his wife get undressed, a horrific trip to the dentist and his children, as well as Michael's thoughts on the Diamond Jubilee, Wimbledon and the Olympics.(n)

programme.title: Royal Pains

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a Navy captain is killed in a robbery that went badly wrong, Gibbs' former mother-in-law surfaces as a witness in the investigation, and it transpires the victim had ties to a drug cartel that murdered the agent's first wife Shannon and daughter Kelly. Guest starring Gena Rowlands.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine is found with a gunshot wound six years after disappearing in Afghanistan, and the team discovers he vanished while carrying out an undercover operation. Gibbs suspects the wife could be hiding valuable information, but when a second woman challenges the soldier's identity and he subsequently dies in hospital, the team uncovers what really happened on that fateful mission.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents reluctantly team up with the coast guard to investigate the apparent murder of a Navy diver who was trying to recover a sunken ship and its treasure, and Gibbs finds a prime suspect in a wealthy doctor who had bankrolled the underwater mission. Starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A reporter for the Navy Times is found stabbed to death - and the team learns he had been going to meet a call girl linked to three other murders. Gibbs decides to ask former madam Holly Snow for help in tracking her down. Crime drama, guest starring Dina Meyer (Saw), with Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An NCIS polygraph specialist comes under suspicion when a murder occurs while he is moonlighting, and the agents step in to determine whether their colleague is responsible. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A navy lieutenant's car careers off the road and he is found to have been murdered behind the wheel. NCIS is called in to investigate and Tony becomes obsessed with finding the victim's sister, a well-known TV reporter whose disappearance is seemingly linked to the case - and several others. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates when fellow agent Lara Macy's body is found badly burnt in a campfire on Annapolis beach. According to her laptop she was tailing an unco-operative rape victim, and the prime suspect in the crime is the son of a DC contractor. Gibbs knew Macy years ago, and he finds he can no longer avoid his Mexican past catching up with him as the case progresses. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Lt Dean captures Gibbs in Mexico and hands him over to Paloma Reynosa, head of a drug cartel and daughter of the man he killed. She tries to persuade him to aid her master plan by threatening to kill his father. Alejandro Rivera arrives with a platoon of Mexican troops, but hopes of rescue may be premature. Meanwhile, Ziva is accepted as a US citizen.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate the death of a senior navy officer on board presidential plane Air Force One. Forensic tests indicate the fatality was due to natural causes, but Abby remains convinced he was murdered. US drama, starring Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US marine's parachute fails to open during a training exercise and he plunges to his death, leaving the team to determine whether he was murdered. The man had a reputation for good fortune and invariably walked away from accidents unscathed - but his luck at the poker table may have cost him dearly. Mark Harmon and David McCallum star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A naval commander's body is washed ashore along with the bullet-riddled corpses of two drug traffickers, suggesting he was involved in illicit activities. Gibbs refuses to believe the worst and tries to prove the man's innocence by finding whoever else was involved in the shoot-out. Guest starring Emilie de Ravin (Lost).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates a role-playing game believed to have caused the death of a sailor who was found at the bottom of the sea in his dress whites. Discovering the dead man was a compulsive player, Gibbs and the crew try to find out how far he would have gone to exact revenge on his arch-enemy, another seaman. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The Bakers, the stars of America's top reality TV show, are rocked by scandal when 13-year-old daughter Lane is discovered to be three months pregnant. Ultra-conservative parents Pam and Frank resist SVU involvement in a misguided attempt to shield their 10 children - and their lucrative TV empire - from disgrace. However, when Lane accuses one of the show's cameramen of raping her, one who happens to have already had a vasectomy, it becomes clear the Bakers are trying to protect someone. Unable to aid in the inquiry due to her own pregnancy, Rollins decides to make good use of her time away from the beat to binge-watch the Bakers' show in an effort to identify potential suspects. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hartigay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The hunt for a missing teenage girl takes an emotional toll on Sgt Dodds, and DNA evidence becomes the crucial link the team needs to identify the youngster's abductor. Hard-hitting and emotional series chronicling the life and crimes of the New York Police Department, starring Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson hopes justice will be served as child abductor Lewis Hodda goes on trial. However, when a plea deal is rejected, Barba must rely on decades-old evidence to make his case, and faces off against former SVU colleague Dr Huang. Crime drama, guest starring Tom Sizemore.(n)

Declared a deserter, he was given a dishonourable discharge - chiefly because $1million went missing from his ship's safe on the day he vanished. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs, Tony and Kate board an aircraft carrier to investigate the deaths of two crewmen who appear to have overdosed, even though the pair had no history of drug use. At first the inquiry seems doomed to failure - until training tapes offer an unlikely lead. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The partially dissolved body of a submariner is discovered in a tub of acid at a Navy base - but Gibbs discovers no crew members have been reported missing and deduces an imposter has assumed the dead man's identity. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sasha Alexander.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The investigators head for Cuba to look into the mysterious death of a Navy translator stationed at Guantanamo Bay. Discovering a terrorist is plotting to kill one of his own accomplices, they try to thwart the plan before tragedy occurs. Starring Mark Harmon and Sasha Alexander.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is forced to exhume the body of a marine in a bid to ascertain whether a phone call to his widow, allegedly from beyond the grave, was a malicious hoax or evidence that he is still alive. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is buried alive, but manages to claw her way out of the grave. The only thing she remembers is that someone has planted a bomb on board a Navy ship - but in the process of trying to learn her identity, the team discovers things are not as they seem. Sherilyn Fenn (Twin Peaks) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A spy satellite technician's voyeuristic activities inadvertently lead to him witnessing the murder of a Navy commander involved in an important weapons project. Tipped off by an anonymous call, the investigators arrive at the base to find the victim has been stabbed in the back. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sasha Alexander.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team races to find a sniper who is targeting marine recruitment officers and picking them off one by one. The only clue is a white feather left at the scene of each shooting - and in the absence of any other evidence, Gibbs uses himself as bait to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sasha Alexander and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Three similar execution-style killings take place, and the team discovers one of the victims was going through a messy divorce. His widow falls under suspicion of committing the first two crimes to mask the murder of her husband - but, unfortunately for the agents, she has an alibi. Starring Michael Weatherly and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs entrusts the team with the task of finding his former commanding officer, who has gone on the run rather than staying behind to face charges of killing a marine and stealing funds. Kate and Tony's investigation leads them to the missing man's cabin - which has been sprayed with bullets and contains an unidentified corpse. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky, Gerald and Kate are taken hostage by a gunman who demands evidence relating to the recent shooting of a suspected terrorist. As Gibbs and the team struggle to resolve the crisis, they are alarmed to discover there is a Hamas operative in their midst. Crime drama, guest starring Alan Dale (Ugly Betty).(n)

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: Neal tries to secure the Pink Panthers' trust by aligning himself with a dangerous enemy from his past. Starring Matthew Bomer.(n)

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: Neal is conflicted when the Pink Panthers ask him to con an innocent mark. Meanwhile, Peter works with an Interpol agent whose activities could jeopardise their whole operation.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A music student is raped at gunpoint in her apartment - but although the SVU squad is quick to make an arrest, high-profile defence attorney Bayard Ellis tries to undermine prosecution evidence and damage the victim's credibility. Drama, guest starring Sofia Vassilieva.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Cragen goes undercover when a murder in Brighton Beach leads the team to a thriving mail-order bride business, and hopes to hunt down the killer. Elsewhere, the detectives expose a blackmail scam run by the Russian Mafia. Crime drama, guest starring Timothy Busfield and Izabella Miko.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam becomes a bounty hunter escorting a prisoner across the country. Time-hopping, body-swapping adventures, starring Scott Bakula.(n)

Thriller sequel, with Gary Stretch, Jaleel White, Sarah Lieving and Robert Picardo.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager

programme.title: Bermuda Tentacles
programme.desc: The US president's plane crashes in the Bermuda Triangle, with the head of state surviving the disaster using an escape pod. A fleet of Navy vessels is sent to recover him, only to discover the crash has awoken a terrifying monster from the ocean depths. Thriller, starring Linda Hamilton and Trevor Donovan.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise face their deadliest enemies, the Borg, who travel back in time in an attempt to change Earth's history. The starship follows on a mission to foil their plan, but the vessel is taken over by members of the cyborg collective, leaving Picard consumed by a desire for revenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, James Cromwell and Alice Krige.(n)

programme.title: Wing Commander

Sci-fi adventure based on the computer game, starring Freddie Prinze Jr, Matthew Lillard, Saffron Burrows and Tcheky Karyo.(n)

programme.title: Pandorum

Sci-fi horror, starring Ben Foster and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
programme.desc: CBeebies contributes to the BBC's Shakespeare Festival 2016 with a special performance of the bard's magical play, tailored to pre-school audiences. Swashbuckle's Cook and Line (Joseph Elliott and Richard David-Caine) swap swabbing the deck for treading the boards as a pair of stage-hands helping William Shakespeare put on his play. Josette Simon and Roger Griffiths preside as Titania and Oberon, Queen and King of the Fairies, while Mr Tumble star Justin Fletcher clowns around as Bottom the Weaver, the star of the play-within-a-play. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: Woolly & Tig

programme.title: I Can Cook

programme.title: Let's Celebrate
programme.desc: A girl from London prepares for the Notting Hill Carnival by choosing a costume and preparing jerk chicken and coleslaw for a barbecue with her friends and family. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: Melody
programme.desc: Melody is reluctant to try a new soup made by her mother, and listens to Music for the Royal Fireworks by Handel. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Ameelie and her friends make biscuits at school, before heading outside with their teacher Miss Mills to make artwork with sticks and leaves. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing, Sula and Flop collect acorns in the park, but one of their piles keeps getting smaller. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: The bunny is disappointed when he does not get an alien toy from a surprise machine, especially when Sula gets the silver rhino he was hoping for. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)(n)

programme.title: The X Factor
programme.desc: The long-running talent contest returns, bringing with it a reunion for the judging panel, as veterans Nicole Scherzinger, Sharon Osbourne and Louis Walsh all reclaim their seats, joining show creator Simon Cowell to assess the latest crop of would-be stars. Also coming back to the X Factor family this year is presenter Dermot O'Leary, who takes over hosting duties from Caroline Flack and Olly Murs. As ever, the contest gets under way with the auditions stage, in which Cowell and co will be expected to successfully identify the stars of tomorrow from the thousands of hopeful competitors taking to the stage.(n)

programme.title: The Xtra Factor
programme.desc: New series. Rylan Clark-Neal and Matt Edmondson return with the talent contest's companion show, and begin with a live edition giving fans a chance to discuss the first auditions.(n)

programme.title: You've Been Framed
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates a selection of home-video funnies, including naughty children, an ice-cream-loving donkey and a baby who gives his dad a nosebleed. Plus holiday horrors and school-play disasters caught on camera.(n)

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: Youngster Fern tries to persuade her father to keep the runt of a litter when a sow gives birth to piglets on the family farm. While the little pig still looks destined for the chop, clever spider Charlotte hatches a plan to use her web-spinning talents to save him. Family drama, starring Dakota Fanning and featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Dominic Scott Kay, Steve Buscemi and John Cleese.(n)

programme.desc: Meg starts a relationship with oversexed neighbour Quagmire after celebrating her 18th birthday, but Peter stops at nothing to end his daughter's fledgling romance.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part one of two. Stan makes a complete mess of arranging a party for his boss - who responds by sending him to Saudi Arabia, where he and the family get an unwelcome taste of life overseas. American and Arabian social customs soon prove incompatible, and a gender war looms. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part two of two. Stan begins to enjoy the power of living in a patriarchal culture, but the rest of the family members find it harder to become accustomed to Saudi Arabian life. Francine in particular struggles to adjust, and lands herself in trouble by staging a musical protest about gender roles.(n)

programme.title: Bordertown
programme.desc: Bud becomes a celebrity in the Mexican community after an angry rant on long-running Spanish variety show La Fiesta Noche.(n)

programme.desc: A would-be entrepreneur from Leeds travels to London, where he hopes to make a name for himself as an inventor. After a series of disastrous failures, his fortunes begin to turn around, but fame goes to his head and he starts to turn his back on his Northern roots. Comedy, starring Leigh Francis, Laura Aikman, Verne Troyer and Kevin Bishop.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: The police find Belle's phone near a homeless shelter - but a body is also discovered nearby. Emma gets the wrong idea when she overhears Moira talking about HIV, and Rhona becomes jealous when Pierce and Carly decide to train together for a triathlon.(n)

programme.title: Coronation Street

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve sweats as Leanne is forced to announce her pregnancy, Sarah is gutted to discover Bethany has failed three exams, and Lauren pushes the teenager to breaking point. programme.title: Catchphrase

Comedy, starring Amanda Bynes, Colin Firth, Kelly Preston, Anna Chancellor and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: What a Girl Wants
programme.desc: An American teenager discovers the father she has never met is an English aristocrat, and travels to London to meet him. However, she faces the same disapproval from his family that her mother suffered, and her arrival raises a scandal that threatens his political career. Comedy, starring Amanda Bynes, Colin Firth, Kelly Preston, Anna Chancellor and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: What a Girl Wants
programme.desc: An American teenager discovers the father she has never met is an English aristocrat, and travels to London to meet him. However, she faces the same disapproval from his family that her mother suffered, and her arrival raises a scandal that threatens his political career. Comedy, starring Amanda Bynes, Colin Firth, Kelly Preston, Anna Chancellor and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: The police find Belle's phone near a homeless shelter - but a body is also discovered nearby. Lisa is disgusted to discover why Zak failed to answer Belle's call, and warns him that she will never forgive him if their daughter is dead. Emma gets the wrong idea when she overhears Moira talking about HIV, and Rhona becomes jealous when Pierce and Carly decide to train together for a triathlon.(n)

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Gail reckons Nick has taken leave of his senses when he announces that he and Leanne are back together. Meanwhile, Gary tries to get to the root of Bethany's problems, and Vinny realises that Phelan plans to use Eileen to get his development money.(n)

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve sweats as Leanne is forced to announce her pregnancy, Sarah is gutted to discover Bethany has failed three exams, and Lauren pushes the teenager to breaking point. Meanwhile, Eva quizzes Maria about her breakup with Luke, and Eileen tells Phelan that Jason has come to a decision about investing in his development project.(n)

programme.title: You've Been Framed
programme.desc: More humorous clips narrated by Harry Hill, including footage of a skateboarding Santa Claus, a game of parking-meter leapfrog and the great hamster escape, plus a mix of below-the-belt mishaps and calamities caught on camera.(n)

programme.title: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: An unhappy teenager at the beck and call of a selfish stepmother and her nasty daughters wonders if she will ever find happiness, but an online encounter with a charismatic stranger begins to fill her heart with hope and the promise of romance. Comedy, starring Hilary Duff, Chad Michael Murray, Jennifer Coolidge and Dan Byrd.(n)

programme.title: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: An unhappy teenager at the beck and call of a selfish stepmother and her nasty daughters wonders if she will ever find happiness, but an online encounter with a charismatic stranger begins to fill her heart with hope and the promise of romance. Comedy, starring Hilary Duff, Chad Michael Murray, Jennifer Coolidge and Dan Byrd.(n)

programme.title: The X Factor
programme.desc: Simon Cowell and old friends/rivals Louis Walsh, Sharon Osbourne and Nicole Scherzinger preside over another round of auditions from the opening weekend, as more would-be pop icons discover whether they have a chance at stardom. Also on hand to offer congratulations or condolences is veteran X Factor host Dermot O'Leary.(n)

programme.title: The Xtra Factor
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of The X Factor, featuring news, backstage gossip and interviews with the judges and contestants.(n)

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents's past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. Superhero adventure reboot, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone and Rhys Ifans.(n)

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents's past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. Superhero adventure reboot, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone and Rhys Ifans.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: An angry Stewie replaces Brian with a super-intelligent robot named Lyle, while Lois insists on replacing the mattress thanks to years of damage from Peter's heavy frame.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Chris attend a fat camp, where they encounter a serial killer who targets overweight children, and Stewie becomes terrified of the robot on the cover of Queen album News of the World.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Joe, Brian and Quagmire are left to rediscover their own identities when they wake up following a seemingly innocent boys' night out to find their memories have been erased and Quahog is deserted.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Tom Tucker: The Man and His Dream.
programme.desc: Peter becomes newsreader Tom Tucker's agent as he pursues his dream of becoming a famous actor, and Chris begins dating a girl who looks a lot like a member of the Griffin household.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve's book makes him famous, leading Stan to become a horrendously pushy `stage parent'. Acquiring an agent, the teenager leaves his family for a life of luxury. Comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Tired of getting nowhere with Miss Jones, Rigsby switches his amorous attentions to new lodger Marilyn, who turns out to be an exotic dancer - complete with python. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter, Richard Beckinsale and Don Warrington.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Alan starts dating a posh new girlfriend, but makes the mistake of asking Rigsby for advice on how to conduct himself in polite company - a sure-fire recipe for disaster. Comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Jack tackles what promises to be the most sensitive and unenviable investigation of his entire career - deciding whether a man with Down's syndrome is capable of committing murder. David Jason stars as the caustic copper, with Bruce Alexander and Matthew Marsh.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: PC Walker receives a tempting offer from an old friend, but as the proposition involves a spot of rule-bending on his part, the decision to go through with it could land him in serious trouble, especially as Sergeant Miller already seems less than impressed by the policeman's rebellious nature. Rural drama starring, Jonathan Kerrigan, John Duttine and Mark Jordon.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Bellamy tries to impress Miller by going it alone, while the arrival of tax inspector Derek Ford gets the residents of Aidensfield panicked. Vernon bears the brunt of Ford's wrath when his dodgy dealings and poor record-keeping are exposed, convincing the wheeler dealer the only way to avoid trouble is to fake his own suicide. Rural drama, guest starring James Weaver, with Mark Jordon, Geoffrey Hughes and John Duttine.(n)

programme.title: Goodnight Mister Tom
programme.desc: John Thaw stars in this adaptation of Michelle Magorian's wartime novel as Tom Oakley, an irascible widower whose life is changed for ever when nine-year-old London evacuee Willie is billeted in his cottage. The youngster takes to village life and the pair develop a strong bond - which looks set to be broken when Willie's tyrannical mother summons him back to the capital. Co-starring Nick Robinson and Annabelle Apsion.(n)

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Oswald Cooper is the prime suspect in the rape of a teenage girl, but presents an alibi supported by three pillars of the community. When Cooper is murdered, Lewis discovers a web of deceit going back 20 years, in which the dead man was used by the trio to cover up a sordid series of secrets - but the case soon takes on a personal dimension for the inspector. Kwame Kwei-Armah, Sean McGinley, Richard McCabe and Daniela Nardini guest star, with Kevin Whately.(n)

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: A professor is found dead on Halloween with a stake through her heart and Hobson reveals she shared a house with the victim in her university days. A medium visits Lewis claiming to have foreseen the tragedy, and ghostly messages spelled out in fridge magnet letters start appearing in a house occupied by four students. As the detective struggles with the possibility his friend is somehow implicated in the crime, a tale of jealousy and revenge begins to unfold. Rupert Graves (Sherlock) and Niamh Cusack (Heartbeat) guest star.(n)

programme.title: Anne of Green Gables
programme.desc: A retelling of LM Montgomery's story of Anne Shirley, an orphan who is accidentally sent to a couple looking to adopt a boy instead. Family drama, starring Ella Ballentine, Sara Botsford and Martin Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Worthy amateur choir is thrown into panic when baritone Connor Simpson is killed on the eve of the prestigious regional Four Choirs competition. A birdwatcher is also murdered shortly after, and DCI Barnaby and DC Jones uncover bitter rivalry and tense marital relationships as they try to establish if there is a connection between the two cases. Peter Capaldi guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
programme.desc: Journalist and former detective Mark Williams-Thomas turns his attention to the mysterious disappearance of Bournemouth wife and mother Carole Packman. Her husband Russell is in jail for her murder, but a body has never been found, and now her daughter has turned to Williams-Thomas for help. Over four episodes combining documentary and drama, he reinvestigates the case, unravelling the truth about the couple's home life and retracing Carole's steps in the hours leading up to her disappearance.(n)

programme.title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
programme.desc: Mark Williams-Thomas' investigation into the 30-year-old murder of Carole Packman takes him to Canada, as he looks into the possibility that Carole was not killed, but had instead started a new life after leaving the country. He later travels to Guernsey, where he meets a friend of the family and discovers how an incident where Carole's husband seemingly fell overboard from a yacht led to the murder investigation.(n)

programme.title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
programme.desc: Mark Williams-Thomas continues his investigation into the disappearance of Carole Packman, looking deeper into the relationship of her husband Russell and his mistress Patricia. One of Patricia's old boyfriends gives his account of how the couple behaved after the disappearance, and Mark also discovers that five years after, someone claiming to be Carole signed over her half of the family home to Patricia. A handwriting expert helps Mark find answers.(n)

programme.title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
programme.desc: Mark Williams-Thomas nears the end of his investigation into the disappearance of Carole Packman, pondering whether her home could be a crime scene. Thirty years ago, the police conducted a thorough search of the property, but they never dug up the garden, so he and his forensic team search for traces of a body. He also receives a series of letters from Russell in prison making astonishing claims - but what is the truth? With his investigation finally at an end, Mark reveals to Sam what he believes happened to her mother three decades earlier. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Hill investigates a series of mysterious deaths resembling the various martyrdoms of Christian saints and realises they are being instigated by a shadowy figure who presides over a sinister suicide cult. A local vicar seems the most likely suspect, but his own death rules him out of the investigation - and events culminate in a surprise revelation. Psychological thriller, starring Robson Green.(n)

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Hill's judgement is called into question by the press, which gleefully seizes on DNA evidence suggesting he may once have unwittingly helped secure the conviction of an innocent man. Finding himself the subject of a media witch-hunt, he experiences a crisis of confidence - which is exacerbated by Alex's decision that she can no longer permit him to work for the police.(n)

programme.title: May the Best House Win
programme.desc: Four homeowners in Nottingham compete for the £1,000 prize. The tours begin at a modern new-build three-storey house, home to a jewellery designer, before heading to a lad's pad in the upstairs of a converted 1960s bungalow. The competitors then rate a red home, before the day ends at a gothic semi-detached property.(n)

programme.title: May the Best House Win
programme.desc: Four Birmingham homeowners rate one another's properties, hoping to win the £1,000 prize. Under inspection are Helen Funge's clutter-free detached home, Matt Price's city-centre pad, David Grainger's medieval-style terrace and Jane Cresdee's eco-friendly home, complete with water-saving toilet. Narrated by Guy Porritt.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: New tenant Osborne seemingly dies after eating a bowl of Miss Jones' home-made soup, plunging the household into mourning - but Rigsby is the one who ends up being measured for a coffin. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter.(n)

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.(n)

programme.title: Movies Now
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, reviews and interviews with the stars.(n)

programme.title: In Loving Memory
programme.desc: Billy celebrates his birthday with a drink - on the day he and Ivy are in the dock at court. Comedy set in an undertakers, starring Thora Hird.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A dangerous ex-con returns to Aidensfield hoping to exact revenge on Merton, the officer who apprehended him, and takes Jenny hostage. Meanwhile, the village is rocked by a spate of car thefts and Vernon organises a charity auction. Drama, starring Duncan Bell, Sarah Tansey and Paul Brennan.(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: David plans a surprise party for Karen's 40th birthday, even though she'd rather not bother, and Anna rekindles her romance with Simon now he's returned from Australia a single man once more. Jess is devastated to receive disappointing A level results, meaning she can't get away from home, and newcomers the Morecroft family arrive in Skelthwaite, hoping to shake off their tragic past.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Suspicion falls on Adam over missing hospital funds and Mike attends a meeting to assess the mental welfare of a 50-year-old man (guest Andrew Dunn) who still lives with his mother. Elsewhere, Gordon's former father-in-law pays an unexpected visit with sobering news and Ken makes a confession to his colleagues. Guest starring Michael Jayston.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica travels to Wyoming to attend the funeral of an old friend, but instead finds herself investigating the mysterious death of a man everyone despised. Noah Beery Jr (The Rockford Files) and Stella Stevens (Flamingo Road) guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A huge scandal threatens Bohemia, as Holmes is outwitted by a bewitching woman's blackmail who owns a compromising photograph of a European royal. Period detective drama, starring Jeremy Brett as the brilliant Baker Street sleuth, with David Burke as his trusty companion Dr Watson, guest starring Gayle Hunnicutt.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Merton organises a search of the moors after a farming couple are reported missing, leaving Jenny and Liz to look after their bemused children. Meanwhile, a reluctant Bernie is taken on a mini break to a country hotel by Vernon - but he grows increasingly dismayed over the plans for a new garage. Rural drama, starring Geoffrey Hughes, Duncan Bell and Sarah Tansey.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Jill becomes unwell after receiving the results of a pregnancy test. Elsewhere, when a baby goes missing, suspicion falls on the parents of a girl admitted with a broken ankle. Meanwhile, Gordon makes a discovery about a diabetic patient that explains his behaviour and, in a dramatic finale, tragedy looms. Daniel Casey guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Stephen is faced with a dilemma when he meets an old flame. Karen and David begin to worry about the whereabouts of Jess, and an elderly patient is distraught when his partner is put into care. Drama following community nurses living and working in a small Yorkshire town, starring Leslie Ash, Phil Middlemiss and Thomas Craig.(n)

programme.title: In Loving Memory
programme.desc: Ivy aims to be elected as the first female President of the British Undertakers' Association. Comedy, starring Thora Hird.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Rigsby decides to express repentance for his numerous sins, at the urging of his latest lodger, a religious student. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter, Don Warrington and Frances de la Tour.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Cash-strapped George knows exactly what he can sell to raise money - but decides not to tell Mildred. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Merton organises a search of the moors after a farming couple are reported missing, leaving Jenny and Liz to look after their bemused children. Meanwhile, a reluctant Bernie is taken on a mini break to a country hotel by Vernon - but he grows increasingly dismayed over the plans for a new garage. Rural drama, starring Geoffrey Hughes, Duncan Bell and Sarah Tansey.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica Fletcher assumes the guise of a wealthy widow and checks in at a luxury tropical hotel to help an old friend resolve a crisis. Mystery, guest starring Cyd Charisse.(n)

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: The detective and his team investigate a series of bizarre events in the aftermath of a wedding which boasted a most unusual guest list. It transpires the couple had only met three weeks before the ceremony, and the honeymoon in a luxury hotel ends in a brutal killing. Drama, starring Jack Shepherd, with Ronald Hines and Josephine Butler.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life Of
programme.desc: Martin Clunes narrates a documentary exploring how dogs see, smell and experience the world around them, revealing insights into the behaviour, loyalty and remarkable intuition of man's best friend. The programme follows the development of a Labrador puppy from birth through to her own pregnancy as she trains to be a guide dog for the blind, and also hears personal accounts of canines that have saved lives, helped to rebuild marriages and detected diseases in their owners.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The evacuation of a central London hospital leads to the discovery of a tragic death. When Brooks and Devlin investigate, a suspect is arrested but the prosecutors (Ben Daniels and Freema Agyeman) face an uphill struggle building a case - so they team up with the detectives in a bid to gather more evidence. Patrick Malahide and Bill Paterson co-star.(n)

programme.title: Liverpool 1
programme.desc: The squad investigates a music teacher suspected of child abuse, Pauly rows with Jo when she finds out that Frank is in counselling and Cally's brother has a birthday party.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy bargains galore.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Cash-strapped George knows exactly what he can sell to raise money - but decides not to tell Mildred. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Merton organises a search of the moors after a farming couple are reported missing, leaving Jenny and Liz to look after their bemused children. Meanwhile, a reluctant Bernie is taken on a mini break to a country hotel by Vernon - but he grows increasingly dismayed over the plans for a new garage. Rural drama, starring Geoffrey Hughes, Duncan Bell and Sarah Tansey.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica Fletcher assumes the guise of a wealthy widow and checks in at a luxury tropical hotel to help an old friend resolve a crisis. Mystery, guest starring Cyd Charisse.(n)

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: The detective and his team investigate a series of bizarre events in the aftermath of a wedding which boasted a most unusual guest list. It transpires the couple had only met three weeks before the ceremony, and the honeymoon in a luxury hotel ends in a brutal killing. Drama, starring Jack Shepherd, with Ronald Hines and Josephine Butler.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life Of
programme.desc: Martin Clunes narrates a documentary exploring how dogs see, smell and experience the world around them, revealing insights into the behaviour, loyalty and remarkable intuition of man's best friend. The programme follows the development of a Labrador puppy from birth through to her own pregnancy as she trains to be a guide dog for the blind, and also hears personal accounts of canines that have saved lives, helped to rebuild marriages and detected diseases in their owners.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The evacuation of a central London hospital leads to the discovery of a tragic death. When Brooks and Devlin investigate, a suspect is arrested but the prosecutors (Ben Daniels and Freema Agyeman) face an uphill struggle building a case - so they team up with the detectives in a bid to gather more evidence. Patrick Malahide and Bill Paterson co-star.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: A team of commandos enters a top-secret underground research facility when a deadly virus which turns victims into flesh-eating zombies is accidentally released. Sci-fi action horror, starring Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez and James Purefoy.(n)

programme.desc: Jewish resistance fighters out to destroy Nazi fuel bunkers during the North African campaign recruit a Canadian major experienced in desert warfare. Second World War adventure, starring George Peppard, Rock Hudson, Nigel Green and Guy Stockwell.(n)

Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando.(n)
